page.title: 09HOME LIFE TODAY
page.content: The first thing that is a necessitity living in a small village is a car, especially if you have children otherwise getting them to schools at a distance could be a problem with the children going to a wide range of schools in the area. There are many things in this day and age to help the busy housewife get through the day, here are some of them; Automatic Washing Machines, tumble Dryer, Vacuum Cleaner and Freezer. More familes are getting Dishwashers, Microwave Cookers and Electric Coffee Makers which keeps coffee brewing all day if you want. With there being only one shop in this village Bulk Buying of meat, bread and vegetables for the freezer makes life a lot easier, although nearly everyone grows some vegetables and salads. Every family has a television set and some have 2.
